sentences.sContent: a hot dog with mustard and relish
sentences.sCn: 配芥末酱和调味汁的热狗

synos.tran: 滋味；风味；食欲；开胃小菜；含义

remMethod.val: rel (看作real， 真的) + ish (使) → 真人无名， 真水无香， 当为享受人生的最高境界

trans.tranCn: 滋味；风味；食欲；开胃小菜；含义；调味品
trans.tranOther: a thick spicy sauce made from fruits or vegetables, and usually eaten with meat

trans.tranCn: 盼望;期待;享受; 品味；喜爱；给…加佐料
trans.tranOther: to enjoy an experience or the thought of something that is going to happen
